message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic opportunity to own this incredible product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,500,000. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $1,400,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't accept anything below $1,450,000. This product is truly exceptional and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.

Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I understand your position on the value of the product, but I am unable to meet the price of $1,450,000. I would like to propose $1,425,000 as a compromise. I hope we can reach a satisfactory agreement.
